Class NameParserResource

extends Object
    The scientific name parser exposed in the API.

      • parseFile

        public List<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.ParsedName> parseFile(InputStream namesFile)
                                                            throws UnsupportedEncodingException
        Parsing names by uploading a plain UTF-8 text file using one line per scientific name. 
         curl -F names=@scientific_names.txt http://apidev.gbif.org/parser/name
        Throws:
        UnsupportedEncodingException

      • parsePlainText

        public List<org.gbif.api.model.checklistbank.ParsedName> parsePlainText(String names)
        Parsing names by posting plain text content using one line per scientific name. Make sure to preserve new lines (\n) in the posted data, for example use --data-binary with curl: 
         curl POST -H "Content-Type:text/plain" --data-binary @scientific_names.txt http://apidev.gbif.org/parser/name
